info.name: Efficient cursor
info.description: It'll show up on any color and is transparent
info.additionalInfo: If you come up with your own, just edit the style and replace with the URL of your picture. This will never be updated, but feel free to make your own smaller or larger version.

style.css:
/*Replace http://i.imgur.com/kPGxGIi.png with whatever you please*/                               
     
                   * {cursor: url(http://i.imgur.com/kPGxGIi.png), default!important}
